greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n gives the numbers A010888(n*k) for k = 1..n.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: for n from 1 to 9 do for k from 1 to n do printf("%d ",A010888(n*k)); od: printf("\n"): od: # _Nathaniel Johnston_, Apr 21 2011
results.author: Philippe Lallouet (philip.lallouet(AT)orange.fr), Apr 19 2008
ext: More terms and several terms corrected by _Nathaniel Johnston_, Apr 21 2011
